original_text: And off to the side, on the outside as one goes up to the entrance of the north gate, were two tables; and off to the other side of the vestibule of the gate were two tables.
korean_text: 그 북문 바깥 곧 입구로 올라가는 곳 이쪽에 상 둘이 있고 문의 현관 저쪽에 상 둘이 있으니

sentences.original_text: And off to the side, on the outside
as one goes up to the entrance of the north gate
and off to the other side of the vestibule of the gate
